status.description: The HTTP status of the result of the API call. Always 200.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful or not. Always true.

code.description: A machine-readable code for the result of the API call. This is unique for each scenario.

message.description: A human-readable explanation for the result of the API call.
enum: Successfully updated the firstSubscriptionDate for the LISA account
Successfully updated the firstSubscriptionDate for the LISA account and changed the account status to void because the investor has another account with an earlier firstSubscriptionDate

accountId.description: The provider’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.
